line.originaltext: 1 teaspoon olive oil
1 cup diced zucchini
1/2 cup minced onion
1 clove garlic, peeled and minced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 clove garlic, peeled and minced")

line.originaltext: 2 cups diced fresh tomatoes
2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
4 (6 ounce) halibut steaks
1/3 cup crumbled feta cheese
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Lightly grease a shallow baking dish.
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Lightly grease a shallow baking dish.
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Lightly grease a shallow baking dish.
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Lightly grease a shallow baking dish.
Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and stir in zucchini, onion, and garlic. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender.
Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and stir in zucchini, onion, and garlic. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender.
Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and stir in zucchini, onion, and garlic. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, t2, ing10, "heated oil", "over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and stir in zucchini, onion, and garlic. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing10, ing2, ing3}, ing11, "zucchini, onion, and garlic in oil", "")

line.originaltext: Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and stir in zucchini, onion, and garlic. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender.
line.annotation: mix(ing11, t2, ing12, "zucchini, onion, and garlic in oil", "stir")

line.originaltext: Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and stir in zucchini, onion, and garlic. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t2, ing13, "cooked zucchini, onion, and garlic", "cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender")

line.originaltext: Remove saucepan from heat and mix in tomatoes, basil, salt, and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7}, ing14, "vegetables and spices", "")

line.originaltext: Remove saucepan from heat and mix in tomatoes, basil, salt, and pepper.
Arrange halibut steaks in a single layer in the prepared baking dish.
Spoon equal amounts of the zucchini mixture over each steak.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing8}, ing16, "steak and mixture", "spoon equals amounts of mixture over each steak")

line.originaltext: Top with feta cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing9}, ing17, "uncooked steaks", "top with cheese")

line.originaltext: Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until fish is easily flaked with a fork.
line.annotation: cook(ing17, t0, ing18, "cooked steaks", "bake 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork")
